periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3pm and 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 4pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly clear, with a low around 61. West southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
